segments.text: I may go grocery shopping later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think we have any food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you going to buy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What food are we out of ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Go and look in the kitchen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should just get the basics .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Get some eggs , milk , and bread .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you please make a list for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , I'll write it down for you .
segments.speaker: S2
